member-title: Authentication form in WIMEHR business platform
member-p: Wishing you more and more success as a dear producer and supplier, please complete the sections in this form carefully and according to the examples in the sample section of the export supplier form, which is brief and useful. After reviewing the information, the experts of the department will contact you for coordination and verification of the cases, or a confirmation request will be sent to you via SMS and email.
member-records-p: Add a maximum of eight items and be sure to mention the date

profile-h: Support butterfly patients and the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) with WIMEHR
profile-p: At WIMEHR Export Platform, we believe in the importance of social responsibility. For this reason, the amount you pay through us will be directly allocated to the support of parathyroid patients in Iran. These brave people face many challenges in their daily lives and we are proud that with your help, we can reduce some of this burden.
profile-p-1: In addition, WIMEHR is committed to working in line with the United Nations Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs). Your payments will not only help eligible patients, but also help meet key indicators of these goals. These indicators include providing a better and sustainable future for future generations and improving the quality of human life.
profile-p-2: Thank you for your support and trust in WIMEHR. Together we can make a better world.
